description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform people and objects into abstract art forms. The transformations are inspired by famous artists like Salvador Dalí, Edvard Munch, and Pablo Picasso.

users.circumstances: Giolla ate the fruit at an unknown time in the past

abilityReveals.description: Giolla can transform living beings into bizarre abstract art forms, rendering them dysfunctional and mostly helpless.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Giolla transforms Nami, Brook, Chopper, and Momonosuke into abstract art pieces.

abilityReveals.description: Giolla can transform objects and structures, including entire ships, into abstract art forms that lose their functionality.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Giolla transforms the Thousand Sunny into abstract art, preventing it from sailing.

weaknesses.weakness: Transformations revert when user is unconscious
Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.strength: Can disable enemies and objects without destroying them
strengths.description: The art transformations render targets useless while keeping them intact.
Can transform entire ships and multiple people simultaneously.
